General.Name: Pioneer Natural Resources Company
General.Description: Pioneer Natural Resources Company operates as an independent oil and gas exploration and production company in the United States. The company explores for, develops, and produces oil, natural gas liquids (NGLs), and gas. It has operations in the Midland Basin in West Texas. Pioneer Natural Resources Company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Irving, Texas.
General.Address: 777 Hidden Ridge, Irving, TX, United States, 75039

7.Name: Mr. Larry N. Paulsen
